attributes.action: Ban Saudi Arabian Airlines from arriving in the United Kingdom"s Airports
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Saudi Arabia continues to discriminate against non muslims whom arrive in the Saudi Kingdom.
The Star of David, Crusifixes and any non muslim religious items are confiscated and the victims are harressed.
Contrast with the respect Muslims are given to practice the faith in the United Kingdom.
